Name: Average time from 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' to 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time from 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' to 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time from 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' to 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time for 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' to be completed after 'First Look-Please submit updates'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look-Please submit updates' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Awaiting Assignment to Batch and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time to 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' after 'First Look-Your updates are due in one week'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are due in one week' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' following 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time it takes 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' after the execution of 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time it takes 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' to be done after 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-EIC Accept' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Minimum time it takes 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' after 'RW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'RW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time for 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' considering all preceding activities
Metric: The average of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time for 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' considering the impact on subsequent 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Minimum time for 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' to influence the start of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Average time between 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' to understand the impact on the review process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time between 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' to evaluate the efficiency of the review process transition
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
